trans-unit.source: How to: Serialize Using DataContractSerializer (Visual Basic)
This topic shows an example that serializes and deserializes using <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico mostra um exemplo que Serialize e Deserialize usando <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a number of objects that contain <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um número de objetos que contêm <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: It then serializes them to text files, and then deserializes them from the text files.
trans-unit.target: Serializar-los em arquivos de texto, e desserializa nos arquivos de texto.

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo gera a seguinte saída:

trans-unit.source: [Serializing Object Graphs that Contain XElement Objects (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/serializing-object-graphs-that-contain-xelement-objects.md)
trans-unit.target: [Serializando gráficos de objeto que contêm objetos de XElement (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/serializing-object-graphs-that-contain-xelement-objects.md)
